function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential health complications from 5G infrastructure installations","Impact":"Uncertain health risks to individuals living or working in close proximity to 5G base stations","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous health studies and monitor the impact of 5G infrastructure on public health","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring technologies for assessing the health impact of 5G infrastructure","People":"Individuals living or working in close proximity to 5G base stations","Owner":"Health and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Cost effectiveness of 5G technology","Impact":"Potential financial strain on service providers and limited return on investment","Mitigation":"Careful cost-benefit analysis and strategic implementation of 5G technology","Technologies":"Cost modeling and financial analysis tools for evaluating the economic viability of 5G deployment","People":"Service providers, corporations, and investors","Owner":"Financial analysts and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation related to the proliferation of social media and connectivity","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases through extensive social media use and connected devices","Mitigation":"Public health awareness campaigns, promotion of responsible social media use, and development of digital contact tracing tools","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing apps, social media monitoring algorithms, and public health information dissemination platforms","People":"Global population using social media and connected devices","Owner":"Public health agencies, tech companies, and social media platforms"}]}
